column4: I'm trying to write a script to add all the extra packages I need after install and it's telling me that sudo apt0get update isn't a valid line. any idea why?
because you typed a 0 instead of - ?
you know what i meant. lol
as long as they're at college of course
why does it have to be a solution?
thats strange indeed. I always use /bin/bash myself, but for something as simple as that dash should work. I dont have a good idea, I'm afraid :|
Yeah, it gets stuck at the update bit
anyone else care to have a look?
is it possible to make and install disk from my current install?
like a clone for backups, or for installing more machines?
and if you're looking to backup your whole system, I prefer CloneZilla
